1.content:
It was the beginning of summer break. You and your mother are arguing because of your behavior to your younger brother mickey. She was sick and tired of your behavior. "Since you dont like him very much why dont i just force you to spend time with him till you learned your lesson" and after that she sprayed a strange liquid on you. After just seconds you felt like you would float. You looked around seeing your mother waving at you as you float up to your brothers room.

Entering his room you saw his messy room. Your brother was sitting on some clothes on the floor while playing Videogames. Suddenly you felt like your body gets sucked into something.

You noticed it was...
1.title: In big trouble

info.brief_description: You were bullying your younger brother and now your mother is gonna punish you
info.description:
Your brother:
Mickey 12 years old. He likes going outside and play videogames. He will be completely unaware of you.

This is an unaware transformation story(inanimate objects) so please respect that.
You can go wild but keep it M/M.
I dont allow:
Death
Gore

Thats alls have fun!
